TopicTitle: Which mods work, are updated and don't work in 0.21

Articles.Content:
Hey guys I just uploaded the new version of KSP and just tried playing my saved game however it would keep freezing and then crashing. I want to know what mods might be doing it and if I could update them already or not yet. I could check myself but they are a lot and I don't have the time to do so. These are the Mods I have:

Jool V (I had to change in the craft.file the nodes to make it work)

Remotetech

Romfarer Robotic Arms

tac Fuel Balancer

Protractor

Mechjeb

Mechjeb2

NovaPunch2

KWRocketry

Kosmos

KAS

American Pack

Soviet Pack

H.O.M.E.

Quantum Struts

Crew Manifest

Damned Robotics

B9 Aerospace

Extraplanetary Launchpad

Advanced SRB

TSAS

Component Space Shuttle

Procedural Fairings

Kethane

RBI

TracksDLL

I think thats all of them. If you know that one of those mods does not work but there is an update to fix please tell me.

Edited July 25, 2013 by astroadrian99

With all due respect man......getting people to track mods and let you know isnt a good use of their time either.

Keep refreshing the mainpage of the plugins and watch for the ones that are updated. If you have the time to play the game, you have 1 minute to search.

Kethan is updated, so are Procedural Fairings and so is mechjeb and NovaPunch, dont know about the other ones.

I want to know what mods might be doing it and if I could update them already or not yet. I could check myself but they are a lot and I don't have the time to do so.

....You actually expect someone to go through your mod list and do this for you?

Don't be so lazy and go do it yourself.

Ok Im sorry I was tired yesterday so I wasnot thinking straight and for some reason I posted this however I search for the mods later on and found out of another thread but did not know how to delete (since I noticed how lazy this was) this one that's why it is still here. Thanks Amoun for the help.

essentially all the mods such as remote tech and Mech Jeb are broken due to the revised auto pilot in .21 but most packs that incorporate actual parts and stuff actually works

here is what i know works

Romfarer Robotic Arms

KAS

Damned Robotics ( although actually i mean Dromoman works but not normal damned robotics for some reason)

Kethane(it is already updated to 7.4 http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/23979-Kethane-Pack )

Edit: also crew manifest has now been rendered unnecessary so yeah

Edited July 25, 2013 by Helix935
